data.text: @HuguenotHouse People I know are acting like it is over. It is not over for me.
@HuguenotHouse @marie_kate2 I really trust the Zoe app

@HuguenotHouse @hartsfleurs Now, throw covid into the mix with mass migrations in Europe. Exactly the right conditions for a variation of concern.. Super similar conditions to Spanish flu pandemic a century ago.
@HuguenotHouse It's gone down locally but it's generally in the increase - again 😕 https://t.co/ncrESuCICP

@HuguenotHouse I have just had it and a whole load of my other friends have recently had it too. More than at any other point since this all began. It's really unpleasant & going to take ages to get over. People aren't testing before socialising.  #WearADamnMask
